body.para: A Venue defines a location in which a Course or Activity is held. Every course requires at least one venue but may have multiple, one per class.
A venue record must have a unique Venue Name and, preferably an address. All other fields on the record are for informational purposes only and are not used in any system calculations.
U3Admin uses Google Maps to display the location of venues to course participants. If the venue is not a physical location, for example an online meeting, leave the Can Map Address check box blank.
Once created, a Venue may not be deleted. If a Venue is no longer required, tick the Discontinued check box.
